## Other resources

-   [BES guides](https://www.britishecologicalsociety.org/publications/guides-to/) The British Ecological Society has a series of guides to research excellence on topics like data management, reproducible coding and more.
-   [BioST\@TS](https://biostats-r.github.io/biostats/) BioST\@TS is an online platform with everything you need to know to write your thesis in R.
